titleStmt.title: A fruitfull and necessary sermon, specially concernyng almes geuing, preached the Twisday [sic] in Easter weeke The yere of our Lord. 1572. at S. Maries Spittle. By Thomas Drant, bachelor in diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Drant, Thomas, b. 1601 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: "A sermon preached at S. Maries Spittle."
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
